0.text: Innate: Rell's basic attacks are empowered to deal 8 − 16 (based on level) bonus magic damage before reducing the target's  armor and  magic resistance by 10% for 4 seconds, refreshing on subsequent hits. Basic attacks against enemy  champions will refresh the duration for all nearby afflicted enemies.
0.html: Innate: Rell's basic attacks are empowered to deal 8 − 16 (based on level) bonus magic damage before reducing the target's  armor and  magic resistance by 10% for 4 seconds, refreshing on subsequent hits. Basic attacks against enemy champions will refresh the duration for all nearby afflicted enemies.

1.text: Rell gains  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance equal to the sum resistances reduced from all afflicted enemies, and Break the Mold's bonus damage is increased equal to the sum resistances reduced from the target.
1.html: Rell gains  bonus armor and  bonus magic resistance equal to the sum resistances reduced from all afflicted enemies, and Break the Mold's bonus damage is increased equal to the sum resistances reduced from the target.
markedPassages: bonus armor
bonus magic resistance

2.text: Break the Mold will reduce the target's armor and magic resistance by a minimum of 5 − 12 (based on level), or 0.5 / 1.25 / 2 (based on level) versus  minions.
2.html: Break the Mold will reduce the target's armor and magic resistance by a minimum of 5 − 12 (based on level), or 0.5 / 1.25 / 2 (based on level) versus minions.

0.text: Passive: While Rell is Mounted, she gains 5% − 15% (based on level)  bonus movement speed, which is only 20% − 40% (based on level) as effective for 3 seconds when she takes damage from non- minions and is removed for 4 seconds when she becomes  immobilized or  polymorphed.
0.html: Passive: While Rell is Mounted, she gains 5% − 15% (based on level)  bonus movement speed, which is only 20% − 40% (based on level) as effective for 3 seconds when she takes damage from non- minions and is removed for 4 seconds when she becomes immobilized or polymorphed.

1.text: Active: Rell becomes Dismounted and  leaps to the target location over the cast time, gaining a  shield that lasts until destroyed or casting  Ferromancy: Mount Up. Upon arrival, she deals magic damage to nearby enemies and  knocks them up for 1 second. She will continue  sliding forward another 300 units over 0.5 seconds, though not through terrain, affecting further enemies along her path.
1.html: Active: Rell becomes Dismounted and leaps to the target location over the cast time, gaining a shield that lasts until destroyed or casting Ferromancy: Mount Up. Upon arrival, she deals magic damage to nearby enemies and knocks them up for 1 second. She will continue sliding forward another 300 units over 0.5 seconds, though not through terrain, affecting further enemies along her path.

shield

knocks them up
sliding

2.text: While Rell is Dismounted, she can cast  Ferromancy: Mount Up. Rell will automatically revert to Mounted form without casting the ability and  reset  Ferromancy: Mount Up's cooldown upon completing a  Recall channel or respawning.
2.html: While Rell is Dismounted, she can cast Ferromancy: Mount Up. Rell will automatically revert to Mounted form without casting the ability and  reset Ferromancy: Mount Up's cooldown upon completing a Recall channel or respawning.

reset
Ferromancy: Mount Up's

3.text: This ability can be cast only while Rell is Mounted. Rell can cast  Attract and Repel and  Magnet Storm during the dash, and is not considered to be dismounted until after the leap ends. Ferromancy: Crash Down will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
3.html: This ability can be cast only while Rell is Mounted. Rell can cast Attract and Repel and Magnet Storm during the dash, and is not considered to be dismounted until after the leap ends. Ferromancy: Crash Down will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

Magnet Storm

0.text: Passive: While Rell is Dismounted, she gains  10% bonus armor and  10% bonus magic resistance, but her base movement speed is modified to 250, and she has a movement speed cap of 290 − 400 (based on level).
0.html: Passive: While Rell is Dismounted, she gains  10% bonus armor and  10% bonus magic resistance, but her base movement speed is modified to 250, and she has a movement speed cap of 290 − 400 (based on level).

10% bonus magic resistance

1.text: Active: Rell becomes Mounted and gains  15% bonus movement speed for 3.5 seconds, increased while moving towards enemy  champions.
1.html: Active: Rell becomes Mounted and gains  15% bonus movement speed for 3.5 seconds, increased while moving towards enemy champions.
markedPassages: 15% bonus movement speed
champions

2.text: During this time, Rell empowers her next basic attack to gain  100 bonus attack range and cause her to  charge at the target's location, which has a 0.2-second cast time and consumes the bonus movement speed. Upon arrival or collision, she deals bonus magic damage,  stuns the target for 1 second, and  flings them 150 units over herself, though not through terrain.
2.html: During this time, Rell empowers her next basic attack to gain  100 bonus attack range and cause her to charge at the target's location, which has a 0.2-second cast time and consumes the bonus movement speed. Upon arrival or collision, she deals bonus magic damage, stuns the target for 1 second, and flings them 150 units over herself, though not through terrain.

charge
stuns

3.text: While Rell is Mounted, she can cast  Ferromancy: Crash Down.
3.html: While Rell is Mounted, she can cast Ferromancy: Crash Down.
markedPassages: Ferromancy: Crash Down

4.text: Ferromancy: Mount Up  resets Rell's basic attack timer. This ability can be cast only while Rell is Dismounted.
4.html: Ferromancy: Mount Up resets Rell's basic attack timer. This ability can be cast only while Rell is Dismounted.
markedPassages: resets

0.text: Passive: Rell forms a  tether between her and the ally bound by Attract and Repel, and grants the ally 10% of her total armor and 10% of her total magic resistance while they are nearby.
0.html: Passive: Rell forms a tether between her and the ally bound by Attract and Repel, and grants the ally 10% of her total armor and 10% of her total magic resistance while they are nearby.
markedPassages: tether

1.text: Active: Rell binds herself and the target allied champion nearest to the cursor with Attract and Repel. Rell can then recast Attract and Repel while the tether persists.
1.html: Active: Rell binds herself and the target allied champion nearest to the cursor with Attract and Repel. Rell can then recast Attract and Repel while the tether persists.

2.text: Recast: Rell erupts the tether, dealing magic damage and  stunning enemies between and around both herself and the bound ally for 0.5 seconds.
2.html: Recast: Rell erupts the tether, dealing magic damage and stunning enemies between and around both herself and the bound ally for 0.5 seconds.
markedPassages: stunning

3.text: Rell can self-target to dispel the current bind if she and her bound ally are not near enemy champions, and if she has not casted an ability nor taken damage from or attacked enemy champions within the last 3 seconds. Only one ally can be bound at a time, and selecting a new ally overrides the previous bind.Attract and Repel will incur a  2.75-second cooldown with no cost if Rell binds to an ally and a  1-second cooldown with no cost if she self-targets.
3.html:
Rell can self-target to dispel the current bind if she and her bound ally are not near enemy champions, and if she has not casted an ability nor taken damage from or attacked enemy champions within the last 3 seconds. Only one ally can be bound at a time, and selecting a new ally overrides the previous bind.
Attract and Repel will incur a  2.75-second cooldown with no cost if Rell binds to an ally and a  1-second cooldown with no cost if she self-targets.
markedPassages: 2.75-second
1-second

0.text: Active: Rell erupts with magnetic fury,  pulling nearby enemies inward. She then creates a  Kinematic field around her for the next 2 seconds that deals magic damage and  drags nearby enemies every 0.25 seconds.
0.html: Active: Rell erupts with magnetic fury, pulling nearby enemies inward. She then creates a Kinematic field around her for the next 2 seconds that deals magic damage and drags nearby enemies every 0.25 seconds.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Spoils of War: Grants a charge every 35 seconds, up to 3 charges. Basic attacks can consume a charge to execute minions. Basic attacks execute minions below ( 50% / 30%) of their maximum health. Killing a minion by any means with a charge grants you and the nearest allied champion kill gold. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.
Unique – Quest: Earn 500 using this item to upgrade to Targon's Buckler, gaining the Warding active with 3 wards in stock.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SPOILS OF WAR: Grants a charge every 35 seconds, up to 3 charges. Basic attacks can consume a charge to execute minions. Basic attacks  execute minions below ( 50% /  30%) of their maximum health. Killing a minion by any means with a charge grants you and the nearest allied champion kill  gold. These effects require an allied champion to be nearby. Receive diminishing gold from excessive minion kills.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Conduit: Designate an allied champion as the Accomplice, forming a tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as the Accomplice by one Zeke's Convergence at a time (60 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – CONDUIT: Designate an allied champion as the Accomplice, forming a  tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as the Accomplice by one Zeke's Convergence at a time (60 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Convergence: Immobilizing enemy champions marks them for 8 seconds. Your Accomplice's basic attacks on-hit and ability hits against marked enemies fire a missile at them that deals them 30 − 70 (based on level) (+ 7.5% AP) (+ 1.5% maximum health) bonus magic damage upon arrival.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – CONVERGENCE:  Immobilizing enemy champions marks them for 8 seconds. Your Accomplice's basic attacks on-hit and ability hits against marked enemies fire a missile at them that deals them 30 − 70 (based on level) (+ 7.5% AP) (+ 1.5% maximum health) bonus magic damage upon arrival.

active.originHTML:
Active

Unique – Pledge: Designate an allied champion as Worthy, forming a tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as Worthy by one Knight's Vow at a time (60 second cooldown).
active.originText: UNIQUE – PLEDGE: Designate an allied champion as Worthy, forming a  tether between you and them. Champions can only be designated as Worthy by one Knight's Vow at a time (60 second cooldown).

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sacrifice: While your Worthy ally is nearby and you are above 30% of your maximum health, redirect 10% of the post-mitigation physical and magic damage they take to you as true damage and heal for 7% of the damage dealt by your Worthy ally to champions. If they are below 30% maximum health, the damage redirection is increased to 20%.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SACRIFICE: While your Worthy ally is nearby and you are above 30% of your maximum health, redirect 10% of the post-mitigation physical and magic damage they take to you as true damage and  heal for 7% of the damage dealt by your Worthy ally to champions. If they are below 30% maximum health, the damage redirection is increased to 20%.

She will continue  sliding forward another 300 units over 0.5 seconds, though not through terrain, affecting further enemies along her path.

st_flatStats0.concerningText: Active: Rell becomes Dismounted and  leaps to the target location over the cast time, gaining a  shield that lasts until destroyed or casting  Ferromancy: Mount Up. Upon arrival, she deals magic damage to nearby enemies and  knocks them up for 1 second. She will continue  sliding forward another 300 units over 0.5 seconds, though not through terrain, affecting further enemies along her path.
Active: Rell becomes Mounted and gains  15% bonus movement speed for 3.5 seconds, increased while moving towards enemy  champions.
